data.text: At Wat Phra Koed, where you can make 'Tung' a pennant used in religious rites and visit the community museum. http://t.co/Oc2G6j5KwJ
A look inside Wat Suan Tan #nan #Thailand http://t.co/7Mgic33giA
Wat Suan Tan, established in 1456 that combines a hindu/khmer style. http://t.co/MRXzwxkrOm
We've now reached kampang muang Nan (The Old Wall) constructed in 1885 an Prof. Pirom explains its long history. http://t.co/APV8KHFrTT
The mayor of the municipality of Nan welcomes Nok air and media before we start our bike tour through the city. http://t.co/qtdqVUTLj1
RT @Patee122: On your next flight with Nok Air but these key chains. They give new hearts to babies with heart… http://t.co/j5kinE7LC4
Our last eating stop, dessert at "Pa Nim". Traditional thai desserts here are the best, who wants some? http://t.co/szEjSOzcvK
Dinner time! We're at "Zaab Kamlang Song" restaurant to enjoy a taste of northern Thai cuisine.  Tel: 086-1898650 http://t.co/8zgF3AjyBe
For vintage bike lovers, Nan's "Huen Rod Teeb" museum is not to miss. Hundreds of vintage bikes are on display. http://t.co/jzbhJG7AND
The Thai media and Nok Air team are all smiles after enjoying se coffee and cakes at Vespresso Cafe #Nan http://t.co/PNQMfC7UOu
Our first stop in Nan, Vespresso Cafe. A quaint cafe that is a sure hit for Vespa lovers. http://t.co/OmSKZkzOKP
Our journey begins, boarding DD806 to Nan #Thailand http://t.co/fyx3GKlieQ
We'll be in Nan until Saturday and will live tweet to give our followers a 'tweet tour' of this beautiful city.
@HNLRareBirds as of now we're not sure of the flight path, but will send a tweet out if we find out. Please stay tuned :)
@9VSKA definitely not! :)
@9VSKA right now we are not sure of the routing, but we'll update you if we can find out :)
@9VSKA @fhavg it would be an epic twitter party if you guys were on the same flight. Make sure to let us know!
@196Destinations we fly from Bangkok (DMK) to Yangon with two daily flights. Please go to http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl for more info.
@FHavg it was a mistake, sorry about that. We got a little too excited :)
Our new Boeing 737-800 is about to fly back to Bangkok to join the family. Please give her a warm welcome! http://t.co/1O2q0kwFrF
@9VSKA oops! Apologies for that mistake. Thanks for pointing it out.
We're at Central Festival Hat Yai from today until 16 with special fares starting 1099THB. http://t.co/DjJiKJJGYH
@196Destinations We have two daily flights to Yangon, check our website at http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl for more info :)
We're looking for pilots to join our team! More information here http://t.co/Tw1MeVZnoh #aviation #Thailand http://t.co/jKG9HpZSo8
Big thanks to the team of "Rueng Lao Chao Ni" for a great time this morning. http://t.co/l307YZqotg
@Patee122 and Kris on Thai TV Ch3 to promote "The Angel". Will Thai comedian "Kotee" make it in the show? http://t.co/388X43wh1s
Why is Nok Air's CEO @Patee122  and Kris dressed up as pilots? Find out on "Rueng Lao Chao Ni" on Thai Ch3 http://t.co/5Rnvv5Z6iX
You can't go to Phrae and not drop by Pun Jai to have some 'Kanom Jin Nam Ngiao" a local favorite. at 2 Weera Rd. http://t.co/rwSx4OTZ4n
@superdarksideTH Please visit http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl for the most accurate fares for your travel dates :)
RT @RichardBarrow: Boarding Nok Air & flying from Nan to Don Mueang, Bangkok. Expected flight time is 1 hour & 35 minutes http://t.co/isDKr…
@egretswading thanks for your compliment, that makes us happy as well :)
@superdarksideTH if you plan to travel after Apr9, all incl. fares are starting at 1,099THB more info here: http://t.co/NyISxALDPI
RT @RichardBarrow: I’m at Nan Airport waiting for flight back to Bangkok. Nice that Nok Air provides free WiFi in the departure lounge http…
@RichardBarrow Glad you are enjoying our Nok WiFi service :)
Give a child a new chance at life with our "Nok Gives Life" to help children with heart disease. Sold on all flights http://t.co/q52fWOteKa
@RonWehrens hope you enjoyed your flight!
With flights starting at 999THB there's no need to wait to plan your summer trip. Book at http://t.co/bEErw1uLsZ http://t.co/Ilo9zWYBXY
RT @MEGAPLANE: Beautiful orange bird, NOK AIR by @ord_wicha http://t.co/U11VLbM1I4 http://t.co/G89MnqKJcP
@ThisLifeinTrips You're welcome! Hope to see you on board again soon.
RT @ThisLifeinTrips: Took this bird for a ride today and got a bagged lunch! Thanks nokair http://t.co/yQ9IuD9CHN
Check out this video from Don Mueng's 100th Anniversary when Nok Air pax were surprised with teddy bears https://t.co/JwHEOdlEpA
Bad weather for flights to/from Mae Sot are experiencing delays. We apologize for the inconvenience but pax safety is our priority.
RT @RichardBarrow: Festival Parade at Phra That Cho Hae in Phrae, Northern Thailand http://t.co/wZQANTWfuR
The "Phra That Cho Hae Fair" in Phrae started today!  The traditional fair will take place from Mar 9-15 http://t.co/9crD5yvbT9
We joined the local community in Roi Et today in the Bun Phawet Merit Making Fair. What a great turn out! #thailand http://t.co/nL9uQvP7KO
@RichardBarrow not too shabby!
RT @MiLDVocALiST: Touch down at Pitsanulok and now hitting the road to Tak for tonight show! Thk u nokairline @patee122… http://t.co/E5ByER…
@LedoKevin thanks Kevin! Looking forward to seeing you onboard again soon.
RT @Patee122: On behalf of @NokAirlines .. Our prayers to all the passengers and crew of Malaysian Airlines MH370.
[2/2] We continue to keep all those on board in our thoughts as the search unfolds and wish for the best outcome. #MH370 @MAS
[1/2] On behalf of all management and staff at Nok Air, we express our deepest concern for @MAS flight #MH370.
RT @RichardBarrow: Boarding Nok Air to Phrae in Northern Thailand. The flight time is about 1 hour & 20 minutes http://t.co/5VWB3kOKKi
Happy International Women's Day from Nok Air. Don't forget to show appreciation to the special women in your life! http://t.co/ppduhA0zCb
Smiles were everywhere as passengers picked up their surprise teddy bears from baggage claim #nokair #dmk100years http://t.co/RHgLmcrU0K
A special guest was spotted at our baggage claim! Can you guess who? #nokair #dmk100years http://t.co/IB97s765Z8
Don Mueng Airport surprises Nok Air passengers from Phuket with teddy bears with their names on them! #dmk100years http://t.co/vRplqs5zBb
AOT and airline executives pose for a photo on stage. Can you find Nok Air? #dmk100years http://t.co/ZUnNGPHNs0
@NokAirlines_ENG: Thai celebs @Boy_Pakorn_ch3 and Ploy Cherman in the front row at the Don Mueng Event #dmk100years http://t.co/R5y2uhXaot
@MeowZoomZam oh sorry, misunderstood that lol!
@MeowZoomZam have a good flight!
The opening show for the 100th Anniversary celebration opens with a dance performance #dmk100years http://t.co/ZIKMieq4jU
Mr. Piya Yodmani, Deputy CEO of Nok Air presents flowers to celebrate the 100th Anniv. of Don Mueng Airport. http://t.co/YdeBoRwEMp
Our booth at Don Mueng Airport today. Make sure to come by and and visit #dmk100years #nokair http://t.co/wRVizuKNKE
Our thoughts and prayers go out to passengers and crew on Malaysia Airlines #MH370
Happy 100th Anniversary to Don Mueng International Airport! We'll be tweeting live from the celebration today. #dmk100years
RT @Patee122: We are looking for Angels in Udon soon! Get ready!! http://t.co/O26X1alpBX
@zulfadhlizakri please check our website at http://t.co/2RPwzopPEl for flight and bookings :)
@KristieKenney thank you for helping us get the world out!
Fall in Love with Pakse. Fly n’ Ride with Nok Air from Bangkok to Pakse daily from March 17 http://t.co/L37c3jdjqA http://t.co/JqKH4Ozudm
@christypark10 don't forget to pack light, comfortable clothes as it's getting pretty warm here!
@randidemet Why wait til you're older? Hope you make it to Chiangmai soon :)
@trabanpruek Wish you a wonderful trip!
@Boyer4Texas Make it happen Tyler!
@RATSantoss Have a great trip!
@zulfadhlizakri Sounds like a good semester break to us ;)
@mikeeynigger Phuket is lovely, we are sure you will enjoy it!
@AlwaysDramatic Sounds great, make sure to check for good deals on Nok Air :)
March 15-16 we will be recruiting for the reality show "The Angel" at Central Plaza #UdonThani come out and see if you have what it takes!
Hot deals "March Aloha" Starting at 999THB for flights in Thailand. Read more information at: http://t.co/bEErw1uLsZ  http://t.co/sxBJbpUtNP
@Jordi1880 We look forward to seeing you on board with Nok Air. Where are you flying to?
@EnrricoSuave Hope you had a pleasant flight :)
@LedoKevin Thanks Kevin! Glad you enjoyed our cool planes :)
RT @LedoKevin: Nok Air wins the award for coolest planes ever! This flew us around earlier today! http://t.co/kgiX0H7KRp
Welcome to Nok Airlines official English twitter! Connect with us to stay updated with the latest news and deals. #NokAir #Thailand
